com.squareup.spoon

Class Spoon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.spoon.Spoon

  • public final class Spoon
extends Object
    Utility class for capturing screenshots for Spoon.

    • Method Detail

      • screenshot

        public static File screenshot(android.app.Activity activity,
              String tag)
        Take a screenshot with the specified tag.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity with which to capture a screenshot.
        tag - Unique tag to further identify the screenshot. Must match [a-zA-Z0-9_-]+.
        Returns:
        the image file that was created

      • screenshot

        public static File screenshot(android.app.Activity activity,
              String tag,
              String testClassName,
              String testMethodName)
        Take a screenshot with the specified tag. This version allows the caller to manually specify the test class name and method name. This is necessary when the screenshot is not called in the traditional manner.
        Parameters:
        activity - Activity with which to capture a screenshot.
        tag - Unique tag to further identify the screenshot. Must match [a-zA-Z0-9_-]+.
        Returns:
        the image file that was created

      • save

        public static File save(android.content.Context context,
        String path)
        Alternative to save(Context, File)
        Parameters:
        context - Context used to access files.
        path - Path to the file you want to save.
        Returns:
        the copy that was created.

      • save

        public static File save(android.content.Context context,
        File file)
        Save a file from this test run. The file will be saved under the current class & method. The file will be copied to, so make sure all the data you want have been written to the file before calling save.
        Parameters:
        context - Context used to access files.
        file - The file to save.
        Returns:
        the copy that was created.
